name: Pong: Tank Warfare
description:
Pong: Tank Warfare is a new version of pong with a tank/ war twist!

Player Goals:
Each player has 3 lives shown by the numbers in each corner

Hit the other player with your shell to get your opponent to zero

Controls:

Blue Team: W&S - Up & Down  F - Fire

Red Team: Up&Down Arrows - Up & Down Fire - Insert/Numpad 0
